Class twitter4j.Query

Added Methods
Query geoCode(GeoLocation, double, String) returns tweets by users located within a given radius of the given latitude/longitude, where the user's location is taken from their Twitter profile
Query lang(String) restricts tweets to the given language, given by an ISO 639-1 code
Query page(int) sets the page number (starting at 1) to return, up to a max of roughly 1500 results
Query query(String) Sets the query string
Query rpp(int) sets the number of tweets to return per page, up to a max of 100
Query sinceId(long) returns tweets with status ids greater than the given id.
 

Changed Methods
HttpParameter[] asPostParameters() Change in return type from PostParameter[] to HttpParameter[].
  
void setGeoCode(GeoLocation, double, String) Change in signature from (double, double, double, String) to (GeoLocation, double, String).
 returns tweets by users located within a given radius of the given latitude/longitude, where the user's location is taken from their Twitter profile
